Columns.Description: The type of agent the data was collected from
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: The ID of the Kubernetes cluster of the persistent volume
Columns.Name: ClusterId

Columns.Description: The name of the Kubernetes cluster of the persistent volume
Columns.Name: ClusterName

Columns.Description: A comma separated list of access modes of the persistent volume
Columns.Name: PVAccessModes

Columns.Description: The capacity of the persistent volume measured in bytes
Columns.Name: PVCapacityBytes

Columns.Description: The Kubernetes persistent volume creation time
Columns.Name: PVCreationTimeStamp

Columns.Description: The Kubernetes persistent volume claim name
Columns.Name: PVCName

Columns.Description: The Kubernetes namespace of the persistent volume claim
Columns.Name: PVCNamespace

Columns.Description: The status of the persistent volume: Available, Bound, Released, or Failed
Columns.Name: PVStatus

Columns.Description: The name of the storage class of the persistent volume
Columns.Name: PVStorageClassName

Columns.Description: The type of persistent volume from the list of Kubernetes supported volume plugins
Columns.Name: PVType

Columns.Description: The specific dimensions relating to the type of the persistent volume
Columns.Name: PVTypeInfo

Columns.Description: The date and time the record was created
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
